alert.note: Alert for Lumpkin (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 2:25PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lumpkin and central Dawson Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 225 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Auraria, or near Dahlonega, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dahlonega, Dawsonville, Amicalola Falls State Park, Camp Merrill, Juno, Fausett Lake, Auraria, Porter Springs, Nimblewill, McKee, Len Foote Hike Inn, Garland, and Gooch Mountain Shelter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Georgia.
